name: Tripeaks Dream Garden
description:
Tripeaks Dream Garden is an amazing paradise with EPIC adventures for you. Try to RENOVATE the ramshackle garden and REBUILD all the facilities with the help of friends and little animals! Welcome on board!



HIGHLIGHTS

● Innovative Gameplays
Based on the classic TriPeaks solitaire, there are more gameplays for you to discover!

● Cute Animal Partners
Naughty sheep, brave ox, clever dogs, and anxious hens are waiting for you to take care of.

● Unique Boosters
There are tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and handy tools while you are playing.


CONTACT

Don't hesitate to challenge the TriPeaks solitaire game levels and unlock more exciting plots in your hand NOW!
